lead_paragraph: KAISER--Walter. The trustees, staff and Fellows of the Bogliasco Foundation deeply regret the passing of our longtime friend and treasured colleague, Walter Kaiser, whose stewardship as a founding board member brought unparalleled excellence to our residential fellowship program in Italy. We extend our deepest condolences to his family. Laura Harrison, President Page Ashley and Jorge Amador, Co-Chairs James Harrison, Chairman Emeritus 1/3
